articles.title: Chicago's 4th of July weekend death toll surpassed the Highland Park shooting. 'I thought there would be more outcry,' mother says

articles.author: Iqbal Athas and Rhea Mogul, CNN
articles.title: Sri Lanka protesters break into President's House as thousands rally
articles.description: Protesters broke into the Sri Lankan leader's official residence in Colombo on Saturday as more than 100,000 amassed outside, according to police, calling for President Gotabaya Rajapaksa to resign over his handling of the country's economic crisis.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: No antibiotics worked, so this woman turned to a natural enemy of bacteria to save her husband's life
articles.description: With her husband near death from an antibiotic-resistant superbug, a scientist found a cure no one had used in the US -- intravenous injections of viruses called phages -- and convinced the medical system to save his life.
articles.content:
